participant_1.background:
I am a software engineer who works remotely, so I can live in a big city and still take care of my parents in my hometown.
i work as an electrician.
I loved spending summers in the country with my cousins and pets.
I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult.
I loved reading books as a child, and I would often spend hours in my room, lost in a world of my imagination.

participant_2.background:
I don't have any pets, because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them.
i love fishing.
I am blind and my family are my eyes.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
My memories of my grandmother, who used to make the best mac and cheese in the world.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I'm an electrician. I love my job, but I wish I didn't have to work so much.
I can understand that. I'm a software engineer, but I work remotely so I get to live in a big city and still take care of my parents in my hometown.
That's awesome! I wish I could work remotely. I'm single and love the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
What kind of art do you do?
I'm a cosplayer! I love making costumes and props.
That's so cool! I love cosplaying too. I used to do it a lot when I was younger, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
I know what you mean. I have to work a lot, but I try to make time for cosplay whenever I can.
I love that you're so passionate about it. It's really inspiring.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
Do you have any favorite cosplays?
I have a lot of favorites, but I think my favorite is my Harley Quinn cosplay.
I love Harley Quinn! She's so cool.
Me too! She's my favorite DC character.
Do you have any other hobbies besides cosplay?
I love to fish! I used to go fishing with my dad all the time when I was younger.
That's awesome! I love fishing too. I used to go fishing with my dad all the time when I was younger.
Me too! It's so much fun.
I know! It's a great way to relax and spend time with loved ones.
Exactly!
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
Me too. I hope we can talk again soon.
Me too
